ayas.arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
ayas.translation: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifieth Allah, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ayas.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۖ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِمْ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلْحَشْرِ ۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ ۖ وَظَنُّوٓا۟ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمْ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَمْ يَحْتَسِبُوا۟ ۖ وَقَذَفَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعْبَ ۚ يُخْرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَيْدِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ فَٱعْتَبِرُوا۟ يَـٰٓأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
ayas.translation: He it is Who hath caused those of the People of the Scripture who disbelieved to go forth from their homes unto the first exile. Ye deemed not that they would go forth, while they deemed that their strongholds would protect them from Allah. But Allah reached them from a place whereof they recked not, and cast terror in their hearts so that they ruined their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers. So learn a lesson, O ye who have eyes!
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī akhrajal ladhīna kafarū min ahlil kitābi min diyārihim li-awwalil ḥashr ۚ mā ẓanantum an yakhrujū ۖ waẓannū annahum māni`atuhum ḥuṣūnuhum minallāhi fa-atāhumullāhu min ḥaythu lam yaḥtasibū ۖ waqadhafa fī qulūbihimur ru`b ۚ yukhribūna buyūtahum bi-aydīhim wa-aydil mu-minīna fa`tabirū yā-ulil-abṣār

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ
ayas.translation: And if Allah had not decreed migration for them, He verily would have punished them in the world, and theirs in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire.
ayas.transliteration: walawlā an kataballāhu `alayhimul jalā-a la`adhhabahum fid dunyā ۖ walahum fil-ākhirati `adhābun nār

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ شَآقُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ ۖ وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
ayas.translation: That is because they were opposed to Allah and His messenger; and whoso is opposed to Allah, (for him) verily Allah is stern in reprisal.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum shāqqullāha warasūlah ۖ wa man yushāqqillāha fa-innallāha shadīdul `iqāb

ayas.arabic: مَا قَطَعْتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوْ تَرَكْتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخْزِىَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Whatsoever palm-trees ye cut down or left standing on their roots, it was by Allah's leave, in order that He might confound the evil-livers.
ayas.transliteration: mā qaṭa`tum min līnatin aw taraktumūhā qā-imatan `alā uṣūlihā fabi-idhnillāhi waliyukhziyal fāsiqīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَوْجَفْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ خَيْلٍ وَلَا رِكَابٍ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: And that which Allah gave as spoil unto His messenger from them, ye urged not any horse or riding-camel for the sake thereof, but Allah giveth His messenger lordship over whom He will. Allah is Able to do all things.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā afā-allāhu `alā rasūlihi minhum famā awjaftum `alayhi min khaylin walā rikābin walākinnallāha yusalliṭu rusulahu `alā man yashā-u ۚ wallāhu `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ كَىْ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةًۢ بَيْنَ ٱلْأَغْنِيَآءِ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَىٰكُمْ عَنْهُ فَٱنتَهُوا۟ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
ayas.translation: That which Allah giveth as spoil unto His messenger from the people of the townships, it is for Allah and His messenger and for the near of kin and the orphans and the needy and the wayfarer, that it become not a commodity between the rich among you. And whatsoever the messenger giveth you, take it. And whatsoever he forbiddeth, abstain (from it). And keep your duty to Allah. Lo! Allah is stern in reprisal.
ayas.transliteration: mā afā-allāhu `alā rasūlihi min ahlil qurā falillāhi walirrasūli walidhil qurbā wal yatāmā wal masākīni wabnis sabīli kay lā yakūna dūlatan baynal-aghniyā-i minkum ۚ wa mā ātākumur rasūlu fakhudhūhu wa mā nahākum `anhu fantahū ۚ wattaqullāh ۖ innallāha shadīdul `iqāb

ayas.arabic: لِلْفُقَرَآءِ ٱلْمُهَـٰجِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُخْرِجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِمْ وَأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًا وَيَنصُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
ayas.translation: And (it is) for the poor fugitives who have been driven out from their homes and their belongings, who seek bounty from Allah and help Allah and His messenger. They are the loyal.
ayas.transliteration: lilfuqarā-il muhājirīnal ladhīna ukhrijū min diyārihim wa-amwālihim yabtaghūna faḍlan minallāhi wariḍwānan wayanṣurūnallāha warasūlah ۚ ulā-ika humuṣ ṣādiqūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلْإِيمَـٰنَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ يُحِبُّونَ مَنْ هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِمْ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِى صُدُورِهِمْ حَاجَةً مِّمَّآ أُوتُوا۟ وَيُؤْثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَلَوْ كَانَ بِهِمْ خَصَاصَةٌ ۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
ayas.translation: Those who entered the city and the faith before them love those who flee unto them for refuge, and find in their breasts no need for that which hath been given them, but prefer (the fugitives) above themselves though poverty become their lot. And whoso is saved from his own avarice - such are they who are successful.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna tabawwa-ud dāra wal-iymāna min qablihim yuḥibbūna man hājara ilayhim walā yajidūna fī ṣudūrihim ḥājatan mimmā ūtū wayu-thirūna `alā anfusihim walaw kāna bihim khaṣāṣah ۚ wa man yūqa shuḥḥa nafsihi fa-ulā-ika humul mufliḥūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلِإِخْوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ وَلَا تَجْعَلْ فِى قُلُوبِنَا غِلًّا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And those who came (into the faith) after them say: Our Lord! Forgive us and our brethren who were before us in the faith, and place not in our hearts any rancour toward those who believe. Our Lord! Thou art Full of Pity, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna jā-ū min ba`dihim yaqūlūna rabbanagh-fir lanā wali-ikhwāninal ladhīna sabaqūnā bil-iymāni walā taj`al fī qulūbinā ghillal lilladhīna āmanū rabbanā innaka ra-ūfun raḥīm

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ لِإِخْوَٰنِهِمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَئِنْ أُخْرِجْتُمْ لَنَخْرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمْ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمْ أَحَدًا أَبَدًا وَإِن قُوتِلْتُمْ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Hast thou not observed those who are hypocrites, (how) they tell their brethren who disbelieve among the People of the Scripture: If ye are driven out, we surely will go out with you, and we will never obey anyone against you, and if ye are attacked we verily will help you. And Allah beareth witness that they verily are liars.
ayas.transliteration: alam tara ilal ladhīna nāfaqū yaqūlūna li-ikhwānihimul ladhīna kafarū min ahlil kitābi la-in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma`akum walā nuṭī`u fīkum aḥadan abadan wa in qūtiltum lananṣurannakum wallāhu yash-hadu innahum lakādhibūn

ayas.arabic: لَئِنْ أُخْرِجُوا۟ لَا يَخْرُجُونَ مَعَهُمْ وَلَئِن قُوتِلُوا۟ لَا يَنصُرُونَهُمْ وَلَئِن نَّصَرُوهُمْ لَيُوَلُّنَّ ٱلْأَدْبَـٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
ayas.translation: (For) indeed if they are driven out they go not out with them, and indeed if they are attacked they help them not, and indeed if they had helped them they would have turned and fled, and then they would not have been victorious.
ayas.transliteration: la-in ukhrijū lā yakhrujūna ma`ahum wala-in qūtilū lā yanṣurūnahum wala-in naṣarūhum layuwallunnal-adbāra thumma lā yunṣarūn

ayas.arabic: لَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ رَهْبَةً فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
ayas.translation: Ye are more awful as a fear in their bosoms than Allah. That is because they are a folk who understand not.
ayas.transliteration: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fī ṣudūrihim minallāh ۚ dhālika bi-annahum qawmul lā yafqahūn

ayas.arabic: لَا يُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمْ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِى قُرًى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوْ مِن وَرَآءِ جُدُرٍۭ ۚ بَأْسُهُم بَيْنَهُمْ شَدِيدٌ ۚ تَحْسَبُهُمْ جَمِيعًا وَقُلُوبُهُمْ شَتَّىٰ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌ لَّا يَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: They will not fight against you in a body save in fortified villages or from behind walls. Their adversity among themselves is very great. Ye think of them as a whole whereas their hearts are divers. That is because they are a folk who have no sense.
ayas.transliteration: lā yuqātilūnakum jamī`an illā fī quran muḥaṣṣanatin aw min warā-i judur ۚ ba-suhum baynahum shadīd ۚ taḥsabuhum jamī`an waqulūbuhum shattā ۚ dhālika bi-annahum qawmul lā ya`qilūn

ayas.arabic: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ قَرِيبًا ۖ ذَاقُوا۟ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: On the likeness of those (who suffered) a short time before them, they taste the ill-effects of their own conduct, and theirs is painful punishment.
ayas.transliteration: kamathalil ladhīna min qablihim qarībā ۖ dhāqū wabāla amrihim walahum `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ إِذْ قَالَ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ ٱكْفُرْ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌ مِّنكَ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: (And the hypocrites are) on the likeness of the devil when he telleth man to disbelieve, then, when he disbelieveth saith: Lo! I am quit of thee. Lo! I fear Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.
ayas.transliteration: kamathalish shayṭāni idh qāla lilinsānik-fur falammā kafara qāla innī barī-un minka innī akhāfullāha rabbal `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: فَكَانَ عَـٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِى ٱلنَّارِ خَـٰلِدَيْنِ فِيهَا ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: And the consequence for both will be that they are in the Fire, therein abiding. Such is the reward of evil-doers.
ayas.transliteration: fakāna `āqibatahumā annahumā fin nāri khālidayni fīhā ۚ wadhālika jazā-uẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلْتَنظُرْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ لِغَدٍ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: O ye who believe! Observe your duty to Allah. And let every soul look to that which it sendeth on before for the morrow. And observe your duty to Allah. Lo! Allah is Informed of what ye do.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanut-taqullāha waltanẓur nafsun mā qaddamat lighad ۖ wattaqullāh ۚ innallāha khabīrun bimā ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمْ أَنفُسَهُمْ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
ayas.translation: And be not ye as those who forgot Allah, therefor He caused them to forget their souls. Such are the evil-doers.
ayas.transliteration: walā takūnū kal ladhīna nasullāha fa-ansāhum anfusahum ۚ ulā-ika humul fāsiqūn

ayas.arabic: لَا يَسْتَوِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
ayas.translation: Not equal are the owners of the Fire and the owners of the Garden. The owners of the Garden, they are the victorious.
ayas.transliteration: lā yastawī aṣ-ḥābun nāri wa-aṣ-ḥābul jannah ۚ aṣ-ḥābul jannati humul fā-izūn

ayas.arabic: لَوْ أَنزَلْنَا هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٍ لَّرَأَيْتَهُۥ خَـٰشِعًا مُّتَصَدِّعًا مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَتِلْكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلُ نَضْرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: If We had caused this Qur'an to descend upon a mountain, thou (O Muhammad) verily hadst seen it humbled, rent asunder by the fear of Allah. Such similitudes coin We for mankind that haply they may reflect.
ayas.transliteration: law anzalnā hādhal qur-āna `alā jabalin lara-aytahu khāshi`an mutaṣaddi`an min khashyatil lāh ۚ watilkal-amthālu naḍribuhā linnāsi la`allahum yatafakkarūn

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: He is Allah, than Whom there is no other Allah, the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible. He is the Beneficent, Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: huwallāhul ladhī lā ilāha illā huw ۖ `ālimul ghaybi wash shahādah ۖ huwar raḥmānur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَـٰمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُ ٱلْمُهَيْمِنُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْجَبَّارُ ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: He is Allah, than Whom there is no other Allah, the Sovereign Lord, the Holy One, Peace, the Keeper of Faith, the Guardian, the Majestic, the Compeller, the Superb. Glorified be Allah from all that they ascribe as partner (unto Him).
ayas.transliteration: huwallāhul ladhī lā ilāha illā huwal malikul quddūsus salāmul mu-minul muhayminul `azīzul jabbārul mutakabbir ۚ subḥānallāhi `ammā yushrikūn

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُ ٱلْبَارِئُ ٱلْمُصَوِّرُ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْأَسْمَآءُ ٱلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
ayas.translation: He is Allah, the Creator, the Shaper out of naught, the Fashioner. His are the most beautiful names. All that is in the heavens and the earth glorifieth Him, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ayas.transliteration: huwallāhul khāliqul bāri-ul muṣawwir ۖ lahul-asmā-ul ḥusnā ۚ yusabbiḥu lahu mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm
